title: Bug 5675TVT: Export of multiple projects to Zip file fails while processing .vcmmeta file
description: Steps to recreate:1. Create simple project "a"2. Create simple project "b"3. Create file "aaa" in project a.4. Create file "bbb" in project b.5. Release the two projects to the repository with "Synchronize with Stream"6. Step 5 creates a .vcmmeta file for each project.Now select File  Export.7. Select "Zip File", and Finish (see image1).8. Error message is displayed "Error exporting /b/.vcmmeta" (see image2).FWIW, it would be nice to have a more informative error message.2.
